Trade/Device Name(s): CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel
Submitter Information: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
Regulation Name(s): Reagents for detection of specific novel influenza A viruses
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Applied Biosystems 7500 Fast Dx Real-Time PCR Instrument
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel for qualitative detection, characterization, and surveillance of influenza A and B viruses and subtypes using RT-PCR.
Indications for Use Summary: For qualitative detection and characterization of influenza A and B viral RNA and subtyping (A/H1, A/H3, A/H1pdm09, A/H5) from human respiratory specimens and viral culture, and for epidemiologic surveillance, using real-time RT-PCR in conjunction with clinical and epidemiological information.
